alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 4:52AM MST until April 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected through 5 AM Tuesday, decreasing and becoming west-northwest at 20 to 30 mph gusting to 45 mph through 5 PM Tuesday. * WHERE...White Mountains and Little Colorado River Valley including St Johns, Show Low, Pinetop-Lakeside, Springerville, Eagar. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM MDT/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
